lender.name: Essi
lender.loan_because: everybody should.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a book shop.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe that their is something more to this life and that everyone deserves a more wonderful life.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: for a small amount I am able to help someone who needs it. I love the microfinance program. I feel like I am making a difference even if it a small amount I have to loan.

lender.name: Reena
lender.loan_because: it's necessary

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: my little brothers inspire me!
lender.occupational_info: i work on products that help people during heart surgery

lender.name: hugh
lender.loan_because: I am a designer with a great passion for philosophy and ethics and the use of technology to make meaningful connections between people
lender.occupational_info: I work for the government of New Zealand as a service designer helping them make the tax system more understandable, usable and beneficial to its users with the hope of building better governments from the informed and empowered citizen up!

lender.name: Delroy & Vicky
lender.loan_because: We like to help people who just need a chance to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I drive a Garbage truck and my wife is a Legal Secretary.

lender.name: Chameli
lender.loan_because: We at Awakening Women Institute believe that every woman has the inner power to create a happy life for herself and her family and the world. A micro loan can be the outer support needed to make that inner power actual. We are honored to be a partner in the empowerment of women and their creative projects, worldwide

lender.name: Tiff
lender.loan_because: we are all connected and everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I study the relationship between mental and physical health among people with chronic illnesses in order to develop more effective treatments.

lender.name: olivia
lender.loan_because: i want to begin loaning to help others be able to make life better for themselves

lender.name: Tahir
lender.loan_because: I would consider myself very blessed if my miniscule contribution helps to improve someone's quality of life, assists in a child's education, or results in a parent's peace of mind when they lay their head down to sleep.
lender.occupational_info: I manage business systems implementations.

lender.name: Nelson
lender.loan_because: I'm inspired by people who have dreams and goals despite being challenged economically.
lender.occupational_info: Office worker

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Help is good
lender.occupational_info: I teach technology and computers to kids, parents and teachers

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I believe in free enterprise and initiative rather than handouts.

lender.name: walter
lender.loan_because: My way of trying to make the world a better place for everyone. I have been blessed with the opportunities in my life and I am still getting (and using) more opportunities. This is my way of giving others an opportunity to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a supervisor of Loss Prevention in the best Timeshare resort of Aruba and I am trying to get my Bachelors Degree in Papiamento (Aruba's native language) to become a teacher in highschool.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: It is a wonderful way to give someone hope.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own Australian website selling Aloe Vera skincare/Jewellery and Home products directly from the company.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can! Because everyone deserves to make it in this world. Because everyone should be able to lay their head down at night & know that everything will be okay. That everything is all right with their world. No one should have to suffer & worry. I loan because I CARE!
lender.occupational_info: Clerical, customer service in a Children's Hospital.

lender.name: Ward
lender.loan_because: It's time for me to be "paying it forward".
lender.occupational_info: I teach & mentor individuals to prosper through real estate investing.

lender.name: North Ga Coll & State U
lender.occupation: NGCSU Honor Societies & Many Nice People

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: every dream is important.
lender.occupational_info: I write about my company's products and services so that our customers can better understand how they work and how they might benefit from them.

lender.name: Renzo G
lender.loan_because: Giving can change the world and the life of people. I truly value the efforts of helping less fortunate people.

lender.name: Yi-Ru Lin
lender.loan_because: I believe they need more than I do, and I think it would be helpful for them.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a web developer and working with a nice laptop.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I want to use what I have to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I write books.

lender.name: Sachin
lender.loan_because: If I can have the life I live now, why shouldn't someone else have that same exact chance to do the same..?

lender.name: Eliza

lender.occupational_info: I build cities and neighborhoods.

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: I help market products designed for people with diabetes.

lender.name: Autumn
lender.loan_because: because so little goes a long ways. Also I have traveled to some of these areas and have seen how their daily life is compared to mine.
lender.occupational_info: Helping youth to become trained and educated to be self reliantet in the world, going further than what they ever thought they could do.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to have been born into a well-to-do country and would like to help others who are not so fortunate.

lender.name: One Perfect You.com
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help people make a better life for themselfs
lender.occupational_info: I run a website that aims to help people build their self-confidence and self-esteem so that they can live happier and fuller lives.

lender.name: Bronwyn
lender.loan_because: everyone should pay it forward and keep the good flowing. xoxo

lender.name: Kathleen & Greg
lender.loan_because: We hope to help, in a small way, people who are working hard to look after their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a printing company. We print letterheads, business cards, invoice books - things like that.

lender.name: Daniele
lender.loan_because: It's a simple way to keep lit a candle of light... helping those who help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: Helping people in distributing their savings/financial resources in products and across their lifespan so that they can enjoy life and its gifts with less concerns... a way of helping dreams come true, making plans and acting coherently day by day.

lender.name: SMATS Group
lender.loan_because: It is important to help out those who need it the most and share in the good fortune that we all take for granted too much these days.
lender.occupational_info:
Australian Taxation & Finance Experts helping expats, investors and intended migrants to Australia.
We host many free seminars around the world each year, and at each event collect donations for Kiva and other charities under the slogan "help others as we have tried to help you".
We hope that this allows us to indeed help as many people as possible and greatly appreciate the efforts of Kiva that allows us to so easily find the people most in need of a helping hand.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It's right.
lender.occupational_info: I write stories in many languages that never talk back to me.

lender.name: Linda & Rune
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: It helps people become more independent and self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I use to lend funds to large companies. I enjoy lending through Kiva even more.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: We're all part of a global community. People shouldn't be condemned to a life of poverty by circumstance.

lender.name: Creo Mundi
lender.loan_because: We loan because it is the right thing to do. Helping someone build a business will in the long run be more sustainable than just giving handouts.
lender.occupational_info: We are all about positive energy, and changing the way people think about themselves one body at a time.

lender.name: Aman
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Kevin

lender.name: Erica

lender.occupational_info: I work at ACCION- a microlender that provides loan to small business owners in the United States.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: My Darling Daughter introduced me to Kiva and provided me with $25 to donate to My Personal chosen recipient.
lender.occupational_info: I live in South Africa and do not work out of the home now. I do some sewing for charity.

lender.name: The Photobooth Company
lender.loan_because: We love to help other businesses succeed
lender.occupational_info:
We build and rent out photobooths for wedding receptions, and other parties.
It's a machine that takes 4 candid pictures in a row, and then prints them out in a photostrip to take home.

lender.name: Marion
lender.occupational_info: I'm dealing with foreign exchange

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: To help another person is to create a place for God.

lender.name: Gur
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: "That which you do for the least of these, you do for Me."

lender.name: Kiran
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in somebody's life.

lender.name: Markus
lender.loan_because: I was always lucky in making money, I became rich young and easily, I think everybody deserves a good life.
lender.occupational_info: ex police officer, stock market day trader with a lot of spare time.

lender.name: Steve & Krista
lender.loan_because: our mothers taught us "to share".
lender.occupational_info: Steve is a fellow entrepreneur and owns his own gym. Krista works as a Communications Manager for a Non-Profit organization.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I believe the purpose of life is to be happy. The simplest path to happiness is kindness and service to others.
lender.occupational_info: I facilitate groups at a residential drug and alcohol treatment center. Besides the traditional groups like recovery dynamics and relapse prevention I also teach mindfulness and meditation. In another program, I provide one-on-one training to other alcoholics and addicts. My avocation is animal rescue.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I would like others in the world to see Americans as individuals concerned about and connected to them as individuals. Just read "Three Cups of Tea", how inspiring!
lender.occupational_info: I teach science to teenagers in a small urban high school. I also have a farm with horses, hay, ponds and forest so I work hard there as well.

lender.name: Huguette & Lorraine
lender.loan_because: Sharing is a very normal and human thing to do. It is a soft impulse from the Heart.
lender.occupational_info: Here in Canada, we have 2 main languages: English and French. I , Huguette, make sure we understand each other. And Lorraine makes sure every one feels good.

lender.name: Sam Ta
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do...

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: I work hard to look after my family, and would like to help other people who are just doing the same thing.
lender.occupational_info: I help prepare books and other materials for publication.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I want to help others improve their station in life, ease life's journey.
lender.occupational_info: am now disabled. Was a nurse for many years, worked hard loved much, eased other's suffereing.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I respect someone's will to start their own business and would like to do what I can to help.
lender.occupational_info: I program computers to help people get work done and communicate with one another.

lender.name: Nick Throlson
lender.loan_because: It gives me good feeling & in order for me to be a success. I must help others just makes me who I am.
lender.occupational_info: I am Nick Throlson based out of Southern California. I make money online through different methods. Primarily, I am a performance marketer and drive traffic to several different sites I operate. I utilize SEO and PPC to bring traffic to my websites. My blog will discuss several different topics. The main purpose of this blog will be to cover different tools and methods I utilize to make money online!

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I used to design and take care of computer networks at a University. Now I'm retired and help take care of my granddaughter.

lender.name: 441 NW
lender.loan_because: we believe in microfinance!!
lender.occupational_info: We are four friends who help run businesses, produce interactive projects and write. We hosted a Pangea Day viewing in Seattle where we accepted donations to invest through KIVA. We look forward to maintaining these investments for years to come as they circle the globe.

lender.name: Kathy Ellen
lender.loan_because: loaning is a good way to spend money. I think too many people are more concerned on how much money they make and not as concerned as they should be about how that money is spent. I want to make a difference in the world, so why can't my money?
lender.occupational_info:
I go into schools and do presentations on history for 4th, 5th, and 6th graders. They get to interact a lot so it's a fun time for them.
I am going to school to be a Waldorf Teacher! Hooray! In addition, I like to speak French, make anything I can, ride bikes, walk on a slackline, manage my money, and make wooden toys.

lender.name: Nabila
lender.loan_because: I'm a firm believer in giving everyone a level and equal opportunity to empower themselves so that poverty is not handed down to the next generation.

lender.name: Kellie
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to provide for themselves and their families~to be able to go to a stable home after a honest days work and feel peace.
lender.occupational_info: I take in videos from all over the world of news events and get them ready to be viewed on a global news network. I also volunteer with an animal shelter and take care of cats with AIDS.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: It takes a village...in more ways than one.

lender.name: Mike & Monica
lender.loan_because: Running a business requires cash. Micro-financing is a great way to get this needed cash to these entrepreneurs. Kudos to Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a library. The world's first great democratizing institution. And now, the Internet and Kiva. Two more great democratizing institutions!

lender.name: Seth
lender.occupational_info: I work with technology in education.

lender.name: Darla
lender.loan_because: I feel connected to other people in the world that are taking positive action in their own lives. It inspires me to do the same in my own.
lender.occupational_info: I work in technology, own an online company and am interested in technology that helps improve people's lives.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: To empower people to help themselves

lender.name: Zoie
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky. I've been able to work and care for my family, but if I was born in other parts of the world, it might not be the case.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an electrical technician.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: many people have helped me along the way in life so I'd like to return the favor.

lender.name: Romell
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower people to improve their lives.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I saw the chance to help out people who want to better their lives.

lender.name: Dylan Ferreira
lender.loan_because: People deserve every chance at a good life. Kiva provides a wonderful opportunity for people to connect and work together.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a systems administrator for an email provider.

lender.name: Phillip
lender.loan_because: I want to help out the less fortunate. I am a entrepreneur at heart, and love to see an organization helping out people who are making a difference in their community.
lender.occupational_info: My work is numbers, numbers, and more numbers, which I love but do not have the passion for that I used to.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: 100% of my donation goes directly to the entrepreneur, and because so little from me means so much to them.

lender.name: Bart
lender.loan_because: Jesus nos ama mucho.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: When I think of the foolish things I've spent $25 dollars on in my life, it feels good to know that at least these $25 are making a legitimate difference.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I believe that together we can make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I teach science to 14-18 year olds at a public high school in Colorado Springs.

lender.name: Envato
lender.loan_because: On October 15th 2007 Collis Ta'eed, the founder of Envato, kicked off Blog Action Day as an annual event to persuade the world's blogs to discuss a single topic in hopes of inciting positive changes in the world. In 2008, the second annual Blog Action Day, focused on poverty. We invite bloggers everywhere to blog about poverty and encouraged donations through Kiva to help eliminate global poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Envato started in 2006 with a simple idea - make awesome websites! Today we operate Marketplaces, Communities, Blogs & Educational Sites. Our sites reach hundreds of thousands of visitors everyday and are well loved around the world.

lender.name: Elliot
lender.loan_because: I am blessed by God with financial well-being, and I want to thank Him by sharing it.
lender.occupational_info: I design and make software for computers and Internet web sites.

lender.name: Elyse
lender.loan_because: I have been very sick for a year now and I am starting to finally get well again which has made me realize how much I want to help others and give as much as I can to enrich their lives.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: People have loaned me money and advice, and shared experiences with me when I needed it.
lender.occupational_info: Simply described, I try to assess which views are worth the climb.

lender.name: Albert
lender.loan_because: I can give and really I am grateful for what I have and did in my life so far
lender.occupational_info: Working with metals to make something useful

lender.name: endang
lender.loan_because: My mother loaned to a lot of people in needs too. We lived in South East Asia.
lender.occupational_info: Secretary in an electronic repair shop in New York. My frugal life experience back in Asia helped me to survive in this expensive city. Please tell your children to learn English (and Mandarin) so that they can live and work anywhere in this world.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a history teacher.

lender.name: Yum Yum
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is required.
lender.occupational_info: We're an online cookie store who bakes cookies and ships them through-out the US. We do a lot of corporate catering and operate express lunch kiosks in office buildings.

lender.name: Tiffany and Jeff
lender.loan_because: we all get by with a little help from our friends.

lender.name: Parametrix
lender.loan_because: The Core Values of our firm are Integrity, Compassion, Collaboration, Employee Ownership, Client Service, and Fun. Lending to other entrepreneurs fits who we are.
lender.occupational_info: We are an engineering and environmental science consulting firm with offices in the Western U.S. Our business lines include Community Building, Environmental Engineering & Sciences, Natural Resources, Transportation, and Water Solutions.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I am so fortunate in health and financial means. I feel that sharing with people who want to help themselves is important. As an entrepreneur, I know how important small loans are in moving your business forward.
lender.occupational_info: I advise small businesses on promoting their services or products to new customers and how to maintain existing customers.

lender.name: Avani Creations Inc.
lender.loan_because: this system works and it take the whole world to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a small entrepreneur who is constantly exploring opportunities to work within my own community. To improve the quality of life for all of us and also promote ethical and fair trade practices.

lender.name: ginny
lender.loan_because: I can and I should.
lender.occupational_info: Assistant librarian at a high school.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving time, love, protection and material resources
lender.occupational_info: as a work in progress

lender.name: Norise
lender.loan_because: Giving people a helping hand feels good.

lender.name: JaneandRaphael
lender.loan_because: A friend sent us this site and we were so pleased to find a way to get involved in micro-banking. Helping people get a business going with such a small contribution is such a wonderful thing
lender.occupational_info: I worked for many years as a potter with my studio at home and sold my wares at markets and through shops.I have retrained and now work in a University Library. Raphael is an artist finishing his studies while working for money part time plus finding time to be in the studio. I have three grown daughters (my greatest artwork!) and a new grandson so feel very blessed with our life.

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: I am an Entrepreneur now working in the Internet Industry. Project development and Online Marketing.

lender.name: Matthias
lender.occupational_info: Ich habe verschiedene Internetportale, dabei geht es um ganz verschiedene Dinge, z.b.: www.viando.de ist ein experten portal, wo man Experten findet in allen Bereichen der Wirtschaft. www.finanzxl.de ist ein Finanzportal, hier findet ihr alles was mit Finanzen,Geld, Versicherungen , PKV und Preisvergleichen zu tun hat, www.verduften.de ist ein Urlaubsportal, hier findet ihr alles was mit Urlaub,verreisen, Hotels, fl√ºge un Preisvergleichen zu tun hat. www.zaster.de hier findet ihr einfach alles was mit geld und Preisvergleichen zu tun hat. www.kontaktlinse.at hier findet ihr alles was mit Kontaktlinsen zu tun hat und wie man beim Kauf jedeMenge geld sparen kann. www.tarifxl.de Hier gibts alles was mit Finanzen zu tun hat, vorallem aber Vergleiche von Versicherungen. www.finanzierer.de Wenn ihr auf der Suche nach g√ºnstigen Krediten seid, seid ihr hier genau richtig!

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: I enjoy seeing people do something of themselves
lender.occupational_info: I assist people who have dementia

lender.name: Carolin
lender.loan_because: I want to share my luck!
lender.occupational_info: I am organising events, moves, workflows, offices,... - almost everything which needs an expert in organisation!

lender.name: jonmaim
lender.loan_because: entrepreneurs will save the world.
lender.occupational_info: virtual fishman.

lender.name: Giles
lender.loan_because:
En 2004 vivia en Sutiava, Leon, Nicaragua, por seis meses. Fui a Nicaragua para aumentar mi espanol y apprender algo del pueblo. Trabaje en el Centro de Salud F.P.P., y el Puesto de Salud de Poneloya.
Tengo memorias sola buenas de mi tiempo en Leon. Me disfruta tanto poder ayudar la gente de Nica que quiere amejorar sus vidas.
Viva Leon Jodido!
lender.occupational_info: Hago mi entrenamiento como especialista en gastroenterologia en Nottingham, Inglaterra.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I believe it empowers men and women to be self-supporting. I have been so fortunate to have always had food, shelter, love and security. I hope to be able to help others by enabling them to better their lot in life.
lender.occupational_info: I own 2 restaurants where we sell coffee, tea, sandwiches, and baked goods. We have many very hard-working men and women who work alongside us serving customers and making product.

lender.name: Andy & Sally
lender.loan_because: we can't wait for governments to take care of people
lender.occupational_info: Sally works at a testing center for student doctors

lender.name: salim
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with Healthy Happy Family and my faith demands that I help others in the community. The whole world is my family. That's my dear Mom in the profile photo (Age 93)

lender.name: Laurie and Derek
lender.loan_because: We support sustainable development across the world.

lender.name: Markus
lender.loan_because: i have been travelling worldwide since 2001. so i also have seen persons worldwide i just would like to support. i do trust them and i would like to give them and their families a chance for building up a nice future.
lender.occupational_info: i do work as a flight attendant for germany's biggest airline. so my job is to be on a airplane for ensuring passengers safety and comfort. i am trained to handle emergency situations (medical emergency or evacuation for example) as well as to be there to serve drinks and food. i do love my job and to travel worldwide.

lender.occupation: Green Solutions North America Inc. Process Manager

lender.name: steph
lender.loan_because: it what is needed to be done!
lender.occupational_info: passionate

lender.occupational_info: Joanna enforces federal law, and Scott shuffles paper into manageable piles.

lender.name: Jan and Norris
lender.loan_because: hopefully a small gesture can make a world of difference.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Because it makes me happy.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Betty
lender.occupational_info: I've been long involved in helping others by being an elementary school teacher.

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: I was able to borrow money from a bank to start my first business, other people deserve the same opportunity.

lender.name: Mac
lender.loan_because: Being to Cambodia I felt the people were very kind and friendly. I saw great poverty there but also a great spirit. Someday there will hopefully be a balance of wealth in the world, hopefully this helps a little.
lender.occupational_info: Computer Industry

lender.name: Daisy
lender.loan_because: I want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Translate, localize products

lender.name: Kent

lender.name: Chikara

I want to have concrete experiences touching small business and social enterprise at developing countries.

lender.name: Myles
lender.loan_because: it's fun and I like to help others when possible.
lender.occupational_info: My company sells equipment that helps enable people to communicate with each other using cell phones.

lender.name: Ester
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do, I can miss the money and other people can use it!
lender.occupational_info: I am investigating how our body reacts to infection with a virus and defends itself. If we know better how this normally works then we can improve medication and the development of vaccines.

lender.name: Marchelle
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference. I've been helped out when I was in a rough spot and I'd like to pass it on and see people succeed. I can't offer a lot, but I hope my $25 can really help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I am in college, studying to work in Finance. I have two babies, and a husband to take care of.

lender.name: Amlan
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Miru
lender.loan_because: I want to feel I'm connected with people all around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a health care worker. I teach people healthy life style. I love working with people and helping them.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: every little bit matters.
lender.occupational_info: I manage to ensure delivery of the project on time & on budget.

lender.name: Lili
lender.loan_because: I want to live in a world that helps. I don't want to be someone who sits in a world where I have things that a lot of others don't have and just watch. Aren't we trying to save the world?

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place and WE are all here to do that.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: Our money stays here when we pass on; might as well circulate it ourselves than have it done for us.
lender.occupational_info: Always looking for new ways to get better and help others do the same.

lender.name: Anne-Marie
lender.loan_because: It's a way to make a material difference in the world, and in a person's life (their family and community, too).
lender.occupational_info: I work with the investment community and state/federal government to develop new energy technologies.

lender.name: Shawn + Sandra
lender.loan_because: we love our neighbour as ourselves
lender.occupational_info: Shawn-milk cows/grow crops Sandra-clean teeth of plaque and tartar and educate/lecture on floss/brush to people

lender.name: Cody
lender.loan_because: I feel called to make the world a tangibly better place because of my faith in Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Kerberos
lender.loan_because: I belive that capitalism and freetrade is the fastest way to liberate people from poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with email,webhotels and domains to help their business thrive.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: People have loaned me money before. I want to help others just as I have been helped. I love people and I'm very passionate about helping people better their lives. I also used to own my own business. So I know what it's like to borrow money. One of my favorite words is 'altruism'.
lender.occupational_info: I sell lighting solutions to major business. I help them reduce their energy costs and help improve the environment.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I am so fortunate
lender.occupational_info: I strive for a high quality of life

lender.name: Finn
lender.loan_because: Misallocation - not scarcity - is the problem.

lender.name: Katherine,Adam&Chris
lender.loan_because: In BC, a few years ago, we were given a $100 tax credit for each person in our home. We had heard about micro loans and wanted to use this money that way.
lender.occupational_info: Katherine (mom) is a interior designer Adam (23)is a warehouse worker for a local food distributor. Chris is training to be a chef, going to school and working in a local restaurant.

lender.name: Luis
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed in life and if I can help, then i want to!
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and im also a soldier.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: 1. G-d 2. I can. 3. I know what it is to be in such positions, & what it is to come through such. 4. My faith.

lender.name: Trinity
lender.loan_because: I can! (Yay)

lender.name: Patrick & Silvia
lender.loan_because: It's an inspiring and rewarding way to give back, which empowers others to prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies find the people they need for jobs to help the company grow and prosper.

lender.name: sarado
lender.loan_because: I want to help other as much as possible.

lender.name: K, Lee, Ella and Annika
lender.loan_because: we want to help others.

lender.name: Peter T
lender.loan_because: it is satisfying to help people who want to help themselves, and who can benefit so much from a relatively modest amount of money.
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in the technical end of electronic news gathering. We send and receive news material via satellite, microwave, and computer networks.

lender.name: Tania
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: Isn't it our duty in life to share with those who have less than us?

lender.name: Anat
lender.loan_because: I'd love to see women pulling through and improving opportunities for each other.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I understand the need for opportunity. This is a way I can afford to help someone make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Reviewer: a paycheck Nursing student: life's dream

lender.name: charlie
lender.loan_because: I want to provide people opportunities to fulfill their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy helping people through well designed software.

lender.name: Jeanette
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Ingrid
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people to change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I run my own business helping charities market themselves better.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate in where I live. I love the practical help Kiva offers and there is the opportunity to help so many!

lender.name: World Stamp Collector
lender.occupational_info: Do you like to collect stamps, just like I do ? Send me a message with your adres and I send you stamps of the Netherlands for free !

lender.name: Doug and Julia
lender.loan_because: This seems such an easy way to make a lasting difference

lender.name: Nadine
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kunthea
lender.loan_because: I came from a poor country as well and i know what it's like to be poor. Now that I'm in a better place I want to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: Well, I've started a small project especially for this. I collect soda cans.

lender.name: Paula, Patrick & Bamboo
lender.loan_because: We believe that each life is a universe.
lender.occupational_info:
Paula is a student who believes that each person can make an impact.
Patrick works for a consulting firm, helping companies with strategic issues.
Bamboo is their 2 years old pekingese dog.

lender.name: Patrik
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Nonprofit Tech
lender.loan_because: Nonprofit Tech feels it's important to give. We've decided to go beyond our support of organizations, and use Kiva to give directly to people, as well.
lender.occupational_info: We support nonprofit and public organization by simplifying, improving, and managing their technology needs.

lender.name: sheila
lender.loan_because: It's not a charitable donation. The first time it's a small business loan, but each time it's repaid it becomes a reinvestment of the same dollars, making me a successful financier. "It's a powerful and sustainable way to empower someone right now to lift themselves out of poverty."

lender.name: John Hall
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur. I know how hard it is to get started and I want to support the dreams of others that want to make a better life for themselves. I feel extremely blessed in my life and that is why it is my obligation to give to others.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist and an author.

lender.name: Chima
lender.loan_because: I believe financial resource is a backbone to any establishment when funded yields certain results which is favorable on the part of the owner and the society he finds himself.
lender.occupational_info: As African we have a great and diverse talents we were born with. It is imperative that we use them to achieve the best be it in business endeavors or other areas of life meant to push us through the falling Economy in Africa.

lender.name: Tara, Drew & Jack
lender.loan_because: when you give what you have, you create the space for prosperity in your own life and in the lives of others. Kiva is our way of expressing gratitude for everyone who has shared their prosperity with us.

lender.name: Philippe
lender.loan_because: It helps you and me make our world better.
lender.occupational_info: I work in New Media developping ways of distributing entertainment with only computers and networks

lender.name: Pere
lender.loan_because: I dream

lender.name: Jon Lindstr√∂m
lender.loan_because:
In Sweden everyone is allowed to take good loans from the government so we all can study at a University. I'm thankful that I can, with the help of loans, full fill my dream to become a Physician. This is the reason I like to help people full fill their dreams and advance their way of life.
I lend money because I think loans stimulate growth and development much better than given money.
I focus my loans on food production and infrastructure. I believe these are the main areas which are most important to improve first in poor countries.
The interest rate taken by the field partners is rather important for me. I believe it absurd with rates higher than 20% when we take all the risk. It's not the field partners I wish to help, it's the borrower.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I can think of no better way to share God's love than to put my resources to work for the benefit of others.
lender.occupational_info: Pastor of Blair Lutheran Church in Blair, Wisconsin.

lender.name: Hj√∂rdis
lender.loan_because: It is important to trust someone and help him

lender.name: Drew & Sarah
lender.loan_because: anyone who has ever succeeded at anything has done so by the help of others.

lender.name: David and Christina
lender.loan_because: We loan because we see the great advantage of a company like Kiva that gives people that are willing to work the opportunity to get out of poverty and make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: We are involved with people from all over the world in their wedding day or the day that they renew their vows. This is a very enjoyable work that is very rewarding.

lender.name: Christel
lender.loan_because: I've received a loan as well from a good friend when no bank was willing to help us. The trust I've got from the good friend, meant a lot to me. I gave me hope and a more peaceful mind. Plus the ability to dream again.

lender.name: Kelly & Dave
lender.loan_because:
I believe it is the right thing to do. If I can help someone/some people have a better life/better lives, then that is always a good thing.
I can never loan a lot, but I believe that even the smallest amount makes a big difference.
I like loaning as 100% of the money reaches the people who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I am in full time education studying Archaeology and History at Cardiff University. I also work for a large gas and electric company here in the UK to help me stay in education.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I think it's amazing to be fortunate enough to share our wealth to the far corners of the globe and help others.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for libraries, which in the United States provide ALL people with free access to books, computers and knowledge.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to raise their own business to act independent - especially women.
lender.occupational_info: I¬¥m the manager of a district office for a political party

lender.name: Brock
lender.loan_because: it is a brilliant concept: a micro-loan. I have been searching for a better, rational charity to give to for many years. But unlike traditional charity, these contributions give incentive for individuals to work, to innovate, and to spread capitalism all over the world. Capitalism is the only hope for ending worldwide, extreme poverty.

lender.name: Diane
lender.occupation: Executive Director of a small charity

lender.name: katie
lender.loan_because: People of this world work better together and I want apart of it.
lender.occupational_info: I currently design clean room facilities, (clean room is a place where micro chips are made for example) I mainly do ductwork design.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I'm hopeful that, by sharing a small part of my good fortune, someone's life might be just a little brighter.

lender.name: Geri
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Pete & Joan
lender.loan_because: sometimes smaller is better....
lender.occupational_info: Pete was an engineer; Joan was a school food services worker.

lender.name: N'gou
lender.loan_because: Good morning, forwarder and logistics training, I research funding in the amount of $ 3500 to establish a brokerage office in import-export, so I take advantage of this fact to find partners in this area for collaboration, I reside in Ivory Coast (Africa). NB: this amount will be repaid with an interest rate of 15%. THANKS
lender.occupational_info: forwarder and logistics training.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: Given the opportunity people can do great things

lender.name: Sachin
lender.loan_because: What wealth I have accumlated is from the communicty and I owe part of it back to the community
lender.occupational_info: I help implement relationship marketing programs

lender.name: ken
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of individual actions and because Kiva provides a more immediate way to connect to people elsewhere in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I study the various ways human activities affect fishes and their habitats. The ways vary from small scale construction to global climate change

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Spirit has been kind to me and I wish to show my thanks by helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired soldier who helps the Army decide when and how to replace certain types of equipment.

lender.name: il415
lender.loan_because: everyone who is willing to work hard should be giving a chance to succeed.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: its something i can do which might make a difference. ----------------------------- es algunas que puerdo hacer.
lender.occupational_info: i conduct research into health and education which is used by government to improve people's lives. i am also a visual artist and photographer. ========================= soy epidemiologa. trabacajo eventual con un hospital y, por le mejor, con el gobierno de mi provincia. tambien, soy artista y fotografia. hago images del luz y de los pais muy lindos como america del sur.

lender.name: Joana & Tiago
lender.loan_because: We want to see other people succeed.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I love to travel and Asia is one of my favorite places in the world. This is a small way to repay the wonderful experiences I have had and to all the nice people I have met.
lender.occupational_info: I sell award (trophies, medal, pins) to organizations.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: "A generous heart, kind speech, and a life of service and compassion are the things which renew humanity." - Buddha

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: It is so little to me and so much to someone else. Also, I love people who work with their hands. Not to mention, words can't describe how important this site is and I am proud to be part of it.
lender.occupational_info: Designing, creating and sewing clothing. Also beadwork.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: I try to get people to think of business and communication in new ways.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: The world can become a better place if we provide a helping hand
lender.occupational_info: Working with people and helping produce better outcomes with technology

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: As a new parent myself I want to help enable other parents to give their children a better life.

lender.name: Simonas
lender.loan_because: That way i have less money to spend on useless things :)

lender.name: Maredyth
lender.loan_because: I can :)

lender.name: Bon
lender.loan_because: Where one has the will to inspire and make a change, one deserves the opportunity needed. Taking charge of one's future takes courage and strength. Regardless of outcome, the action is a noteworthy feat and aide, well-deserved.

lender.name: Taru
lender.loan_because: I understand the situation of folks who need these loans, I was looking for a loan once myself.

lender.name: Norman
lender.occupational_info: I make computer games.

lender.name: Bin
lender.loan_because: help other people who needs help.
lender.occupational_info: network equipments,finacial consultant.

lender.name: Oscar
lender.loan_because: It really means a lot to me to see these people try hard to earn what they need. Most don't do anything with their lives even if they have the means to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I'm just studying to be a history teacher. I love history and i would love to teach kids more about it.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: ...it is more than time to assist those in much more need than me. and Kiva gives me the opportunity to do this.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I know a small loan can go a long way, especially in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: My work deals with people and issues related to health benefits, hiring and performance management. I enjoy travel and being able to experience new cultures.

lender.name: Adam & Christy
lender.loan_because: We all need to share our resources no matter how small they seem. Pay it forward.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I like being able to help individual people in very concrete ways.
lender.occupational_info: As a fish and fish habitat biologist I help minimize the environmental impacts of large and small scale development projects.

lender.name: Vaclav
lender.loan_because: I know it's important to get help with small business; people can do great things with a bit of help.
lender.occupational_info: By day I maintain green landscapes, making sure my client's landscapes (gardens) are in great shape (beautiful!); by night I run an online chess store, selling chess software and chess supplies like clocks to customers in Canada.

lender.name: Samuella
lender.loan_because: I loan because I hope to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach chemistry and chemical safety at a university.

lender.name: Gabrielle
lender.loan_because: I have been in need and have been given a second chance by those generous enough to both show me how to invest wisely and how to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I am part of the circle of learning: I am a teacher, but I also learn as diligently as my students, who are also often teachers or themselves

lender.name: Rommel
lender.loan_because: I grew up in a third world country. I know how it feels to want to better your life but not always have the means to do so
lender.occupational_info: I am a Network Security Engineer in a team of professional geeks that provide and ensure secure network access

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Carsten
lender.loan_because: I just like the idea of give people an change to make there own way of living.
lender.occupational_info: I am IT-manager for local community in Denmark. I also have my own bussiness selling IT products from Singapore.

lender.name: Eva Everything & DD
lender.loan_because: it's the write thing to do
lender.occupational_info: We work in television and one of us is a science writer and author.

lender.name: Roma
lender.loan_because: ....to help others in the world who are less fortunate than myself.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I fully support the micro credit concept. Small amounts can make a big change to somebody's life.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I believe spreading wealth can make the world a better place for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: being retired I now have time to do many of the things that were just a dream before.

lender.name: Lars
lender.loan_because: There are so many of us that have so much & those that have so little. I find it refreshing being able to loan money to those that are trying to make an impact on their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: i work in an builders merchant where my job is very multifunctional. i am controlling the trucks which fetch and deliver the goods. also i am managing the buying departement and the consulting of Customers.

lender.name: Steeve
lender.loan_because: entrepreneurship empowers people.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: everyone should get a chance to make a good life for themselves.

lender.name: Laurent Giroux
lender.occupation: Owner of www.infonaturel.ca and Viesun Inc
lender.loan_because: To be someone doesn't come all alone.
lender.occupational_info: Am the editor of www.InfoNaturel.ca a unique natural website. Be healthy become by what's you eat. Protect your environement, recycle, make sport and be happy.

lender.name: Dagmar
lender.loan_because: It is very importand to give people the opportunity to build up a basis to earn their living.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working for a big travel industry company in the IT area supporting big networks.

lender.name: Galinda&Carsten
lender.loan_because: we want to give other people in the world a chance

lender.name: simon
lender.loan_because: I want to share what I have received.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses communicate better with their customers

lender.name: awyn
lender.occupational_info: Writer, editor, freelance transcriptionist.

lender.name: James K
lender.loan_because: I have learned that every little helps!
